IB Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 394 Junior Intelligent Officer Grade-II Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 22, 2025, 15:56 IST
 Intelligence Bureau
 394 Jobs |  Posted On : 22-Aug-2025 |  Delhi |  Salary : 25,500 to 81,100




FOLLOW

The Intelligence Bureau (IB) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 394 Junior Intelligence Officer Grade-II Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Diploma in Electrical, Electronics, Computer Science Engineering, or B.Sc can apply for the IB Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Delhi.

IB Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Junior Intelligent Officer Grade-II	394	Diploma in Electrical, Electronics, Computer Science Engineering, or B.Sc

IB Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 18 Years.
The maximum age limit: 27 Years.

Age Relaxation:

For OBC candidates: 03 Years.
For SC/ST/Women candidates: 05 Years.

IB Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the

Written Test.
Skill Test.
Interview.
Document Verification.
Medical Exam.

IB Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

The application fee

For all candidates: Rs. 550/-.
For SC/ST/Women candidates: NIL.
For UR/EWS candidates: Rs. 100/-.

IB Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 25,500/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 81,100/- per month.
How to Apply for the IB Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the IB Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application.
Submit the filled application form before the last date.
Download & take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Important Dates:

Starting date	23-08-2025
Closing date	14-09-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Apply Online	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
